title: How to get marks in SOL English Hons - Quora
tags: School of Open Learning, University of Delhi

response.answer_text: It's all about English… So, just practice English and in exam try not to do any grammatical errors or anything related to it and use SIMPLE language, no need to include such advance vocabularies which is not known to the teacher who will check your paper. And I think in English (Hons) you just need to study English i.e. novels, literature etcetera etcetera :-)
